TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class XPathNodeIterator : ICloneable, System.Collections.IEnumerable

public ref class XPathNodeIterator abstract : ICloneable, System::Collections::IEnumerable
type XPathNodeIterator = class interface ICloneable interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 在一组选中的节点上提供迭代器。

span.span: Provides an iterator over a selected set of nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类返回的对象未定位在选定节点集的第一个节点上。An object returned by the class is not positioned on the first node in a selected set of nodes. 必须对类的方法的调用, 才能将对象定位到选定节点集中的第一个节点上。A call to the method of the class must be made to position the object on the first node in the selected set of nodes. 使用时, 如果您编辑当前节点或它的任何上级, 则您的当前位置将丢失。When using the , if you edit the current node or any of its ancestors, your current position is lost. 如果要编辑已选择的节点数, 请创建一个数组, 将中的所有节点复制到数组中, 然后循环访问该数组并修改节点。If you want to edit a number of nodes that you have selected, create a array, copy all of the nodes from the into the array, then iterate through the array and modify the nodes. 通过使用类, 可以通过两种方式循环访问集合。There are two ways to iterate over an collection by using the class. 一种方法是使用方法, 然后调用以获取当前实例, 如以下示例中所示:One way is to use the method and then call to get the current instance, as in the following example: [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#55)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#55)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#55)] 另一种方法是使用`foreach`循环来调用方法, 并使用返回的接口来枚举节点, 如以下示例中所示:Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the method and use the returned interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example: [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#56)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#56)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#56)] 应使用和或使用。You should either use and or use . 组合这两种方法可能会导致意外的结果。Combining these two approaches can cause unexpected results. 例如, 如果首先调用方法, 然后在`foreach`循环`foreach`中调用方法, 则循环将不会开始枚举集合开头的结果, 而是从方法。For example, if the method is called first, and then the method is called in the `foreach` loop, the `foreach` loop will not start enumerating the results from the beginning of the collection, but from the position after the method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 类的方法来选择使用类的节点集。The following example uses the method of the class to select a node set using the class. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#39)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#39)] 该示例使用 `books.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `books.xml` file as input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数由派生类构造函数调用以初始化此类型中的状态。This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator Clone() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Clone () As XPathNodeIterator

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，返回此 对象的复本。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns a clone of this object.

returns.span: 此 对象的新 对象复本。

span.span: A new object clone of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果对 方法进行了调用, 则克隆的对象将位于节点集中的同一个节点上。The cloned object is positioned at the same node in the node set if calls have been made to the method. 此对象的后续更改不会影响克隆的对象。The cloned object is not affected by subsequent changes to this object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: virtual property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取所选节点集中最后一个节点的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the last node in the selected set of nodes.

value.span: 所选节点集中最后一个节点的索引或者 0 （如果没有选择节点）。

span.span: The index of the last node in the selected set of nodes, or 0 if there are no selected nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不影响的位置。 The property does not affect the position of the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Current As XPathNavigator
public: abstract property System::Xml::XPath::XPathNavigator ^ Current { System::Xml::XPath::XPathNavigator ^ get(); };

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，将为定位在当前上下文节点上的该 获取 对象。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the object for this , positioned on the current context node.

value.span: 对象，定位到从中选择了节点集的上下文节点上。

span.span: An object positioned on the context node from which the node set was selected.

value.span: 必须调用 方法，以将 移至所选节点集的第一个节点。

span.span: The method must be called to move the to the first node in the selected set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用返回的对象的属性来获取有关当前节点的信息。You can use the properties of the returned object to obtain information on the current node. 但是, 不应修改返回的对象。However, the returned object should not be modified. 返回的对象不能从所选节点集中移开。The returned object cannot be moved away from the selected node set. 或者, 您可以 使用类的方法克隆对象。Alternatively, you can clone the object using the method of the class. 然后, 可以将克隆的对象移出所选节点集。The cloned object can then be moved away from the selected node set. 此克隆对象的方法可能会影响 XPath 查询的性能。This method of cloning the object might affect the performance of the XPath query. 如果、 和方法导致未选定任何节点, 则该属性可能不会指向上下文节点。 If the , , and methods result in no nodes being selected, the property might not be pointing to the context node. 若要测试是否已选择节点, 请使用属性, 如下面的示例中所示。To test whether nodes have been selected, use the property as shown in the following example. ## Examples 下面的示例使用对象的属性和类的方法获取 Herman Melville 创作的所有书名。The following example gets all book titles authored by Herman Melville using the property of the object and the method of the class. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#6)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#6)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property CurrentPosition As Integer
public: abstract property int CurrentPosition { int get(); };

summary.span: 当在派生的类中重写时，获取所选节点集中当前位置的索引。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the index of the current position in the selected set of nodes.
The index of the current position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引从 1 开始。The index is 1-based. 因此, 第一个节点的索引为1。Therefore, the first node has an index of 1. 索引0指示没有选定的节点。An index of 0 indicates there are no selected nodes. 此属性始终返回一个正整数。This property always returns a positive integer.

summary.span: 返回 对象以循环访问所选的节点集。

span.span: Returns an object to iterate through the selected node set.

returns.span: 循环访问所选节点集的 对象。

span.span: An object to iterate through the selected node set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举器位于对象的当前位置。The enumerator is positioned on the current position of the object. 通过使用类, 可以通过两种方式循环访问集合。There are two ways to iterate over an collection by using the class. 一种方法是使用方法, 然后调用以获取当前实例, 如以下示例中所示:One way is to use the method and then call to get the current instance, as in the following example: [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#55)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#55)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#55)] 另一种方法是使用`foreach`循环来调用方法, 并使用返回的接口来枚举节点, 如以下示例中所示:Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the method and use the returned interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example: [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#56)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#56)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#56)] 应使用方法和或使用方法。You should either use the method and or use the method. 组合这两种方法可能会导致意外的结果。Combining these two approaches can cause unexpected results. 例如, 如果首先调用方法, 然后在`foreach`循环`foreach`中调用方法, 则循环将不会开始枚举集合开头的结果, 而是从方法。For example, if the method is called first, and then the method is called in the `foreach` loop, the `foreach` loop will not start enumerating the results from the beginning of the collection, but from the position after the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MoveNext() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function MoveNext () As Boolean

summary.span: 当在派生的类中重写时，将 属性返回的 对象移至所选节点集中的下一个节点。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, moves the object returned by the property to the next node in the selected node set.

returns.span: 如果将 对象移至下一个节点，则为 ；如果没有更多的选中节点，则为 。

span.span: if the object moved to the next node; if there are no more selected nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在首次调用方法之后,对象才会位于所选节点集中的第一个节点上。The object is positioned on the first node in the selected node set only after the initial call to the method. 节点集是按文档顺序创建的。The node set is created in document order. 因此, 调用方法会按文档顺序移动到下一个节点。Therefore, calling the method moves to the next node in document order. 通过使用类, 可以通过两种方式循环访问集合。There are two ways to iterate over an collection by using the class. 一种方法是使用方法, 然后调用以获取当前实例, 如以下示例中所示:One way is to use the method and then call to get the current instance, as in the following example: [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#55)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#55)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#55)] 另一种方法是使用`foreach`循环来调用方法, 并使用返回的接口来枚举节点, 如以下示例中所示:Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the method and use the returned interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example: [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#56)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#56)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#56)] 应使用方法和或使用方法。You should either use the method and or use the method. 组合这两种方法可能会导致意外的结果。Combining these two approaches can cause unexpected results. 例如, 如果首先调用方法, 然后在`foreach`循环`foreach`中调用方法, 则循环将不会开始枚举集合开头的结果, 而是从方法。For example, if the method is called first, and then the method is called in the `foreach` loop, the `foreach` loop will not start enumerating the results from the beginning of the collection, but from the position after the method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 类的方法来选择使用类的节点集。The following example uses the method of the class to select a node set using the class. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#39)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#39)] 该示例使用 `books.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `books.xml` file as input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

summary.span: 创建作为当前实例副本的新对象。

span.span: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.

returns.span: 作为此实例副本的新对象。

span.span: A new object that is a copy of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
